name: Chalk Lines
description:
FOR 18+ PLAYERS ONLY. CW INCLUDED IN-GAME.

Chalk Lines is a modern fantasy, 18+ WLW story.

A treaty between werewolves and vampires forces two women on either side of the conflict to move in together. Esme, a cis vampire, follows Winona, a trans werewolf, to her home deep in the wilderness, and the two begin their contract together as roommates.

Logo: adirosa

Story, Programming: minute
